name: EVERGLOW Yiren
description:
Please show your appreciation and support, kindly Support me

for more LoRa Creation avaiable at Buymeacoffee

Use it at your own risk. i dont responsible for anything (REGARDING LAW) when you generated this LORA.

Do not use for commercial purposes or to produce harmful content

All of the SD_LoRa that I made is for experimental use only.

DONT FORGET TO LEAVE REVIEW.

サンキュー!

modelVersions.name: Everglow Yiren v.1
modelVersions.description:
Don't forget to use Trigger Word: "yiren"

  • Very easy to stylize

  • Sometimes the face quality will decrease when generating a full-body shot. (You can fix it with Restore face or inpaint)

  • Best Checkpoint generated with ChilloutMix , EdgeOfRealism(recommended) , & LOFI_V2 (recommended)

  • Clip Skip 1

This version has settings that are very different from the existing versions, focusing more on realistic style.
